text.tspan: Aid received per capita vs. GDP per capita, 2016
Total aid received directly per capita versus gross domestic product (GDP) per capita. Total aid received directly is
the sum of country programmable aid (CPA), humanitarian and food aid, measured in constant 2016 USD per person.
GDP per capita is measured in 2011 international-$. Bubble size represents the estimated number of people below
the international poverty line of $1.90 per person per day.
